bug_report_1.title: Incorrect product price displayed
bug_report_1.description: The "Widget" product price displayed is incorrect. It shows as $19.99, but it should be $14.99.

bug_report_2.title: Checkout page throws error when applying discount code
bug_report_2.description: A discount code on the checkout page is not applied.

steps_to_reproduce.step: 1. Add items to cart and proceed to checkout

bug_report_2.expected_result: The discount code should be applied and the total price should be reduced by 20%.
bug_report_2.actual_result: An error message is displayed and the discount is not applied.
